technical_electives.constraints: No more than 6 credits may be taken from the same department, program, or track (except EECE).

tracks.eligibility: Open only to ECMP and EECE majors.

select.label: Elective from List A or B
Elective from List A, B, or C

constraints: At least three courses must be EECE courses taken in the ECE Department.
At least one course from List A or List B must be an EECE course.
Required EECE courses cannot be replaced by equivalent courses taken outside the Department.
Track cannot be claimed together with the Minor in AI (ECE) or the Minor in Data Science (CMPS).

tracks.eligibility: Open to all undergraduate ECE and ME students; indicated on the transcript upon completion.
tracks.overview: A coordinated ECE–ME framework in control, instrumentation, and robotics. Supports students pursuing additional control system modeling and design in either department.

select.label: Elective from List A, B, or C

constraints: Students must meet all prerequisites for selected electives.
Cross-listed pairs (EECE/MECH) may be counted once per course selection.

minors.eligibility: Open to all AUB undergraduate students; cumulative GPA ≥ 2.3 required to apply.

select.label: Elective from List A or B

constraints: At least two courses must be EECE courses taken in the ECE Department.
At least one course from List A or List B must be an EECE course.
Required EECE courses cannot be replaced by equivalent courses taken outside the Department.
Minor cannot be claimed together with the Track in AI (ECE) or the Minor in Data Science (CMPS).
No more than 9 credit hours taken in the student’s major field of study may be used to satisfy another minor.

minors.eligibility: Open to all AUB students. Application after completing ≥ 60 credits at the sophomore level or higher and with cumulative GPA ≥ 2.3. The minor appears on the transcript if the student completes all requirements and attains a C+ (GPA 2.3) average in minor courses.

items.equivalent_notes: Acceptable equivalent may be used per department policy.

select.label: Elective from List A or B

items.equivalent_notes: Acceptable equivalent may be used per department policy.

select_tail.label: Elective from List A, B, or C

constraints: Minor appears on the transcript if all requirements are completed and the average in minor courses is at least C+ (GPA 2.3).
EECE 603 vs. EECE 694 counting: if a student takes EECE 694, either EECE 694 or EECE 603 may count toward the minor (but not both simultaneously).
MECH 641 / EECE 661 cross-listing may be applied per departmental policy.
Equivalents: For EECE 210, PHYS 228 and PHYS 228L together may be accepted as an equivalent where specified; for CIVE 210, an acceptable equivalent may be used per policy.
Minimum total credits for the minor: 18.
